id.description: The login id, for example email

200.description: Logged in successfully. Returns user info.

401.description: Login failed. The username and password are not valid.

403.description:
Login success, but the user is not validated.

If user's validation email has been timeout, and   System sends another validation email to the user Else   System will not send validation email

200.description: The publicity has been successfully changed. Returns the new publicity.

ChangeArticleAdminSetPublicitySchema.description: Change the owner set publicity of an article.

userId.description: The ID of the user to be deleted.

204.description: The user and all related is deleted.

AdminDeleteUserSchema.description: Delete a user and all of related articles. Only admin can do it.

page.description: The page number. 10 results per page.

totalCount.description: The total count of articles with specified search keyword.

page.description: The page number of returned users.

AdminGetUsersSchema.description: Get all users on the system.

articleId.description: The ID of the article to be deleted.

204.description: The article and all is deleted.

DeleteArticleSchema.description: Delete an article and all of its revisions. Only the owner and admin can do it.

revision.description: Revision number. If not set, the latest revision will be returned.

200.description: Returns the latest revision of an article.

404.description: The article or specified revision is not found.

GetArticleSchema.description: Get the full information of an article.

revision.description: The number of revision. If not set, return the latest revision

GetArticleFileSchema.description: 200 responses has a header x-yaarxiv-filetype Possble values are ALLOWED_SCRIPT_FORMAT

articleId.description: The ID of the article to be deleted.

403.description: retracted: the article has already been retracted noAccess: only the author and admin can retract the article

RetractArticleSchema.description: Delete an article and all of its revisions. Only the owner and admin can do it.

authorNames.description: The name of authors Search articles with ALL of specified authors. Keyword can NOT be incomplete. For example, for keywords ["Author1", "Author2"]:    ["Author1", "Author2", "Author3"] Yes    ["Author1"] No    ["Author", "Author2"] No

keywords.description: Keywords. Search articles with ALL of specified keywords. Keyword can be incomplete. For example, for keywords ["Computer", "Biology"]:    ["Computer", "Biology", "Chemistry"] Yes    ["Computer Science", "Biology", "Cheistry"] Yes    ["Computer Science", "Physics"] No    ["Computer", "Physics"] No

page.description: The page number. 10 results per page.

codeLink.description: Link to code. Should pass validation from utils/codeLink.ts

pdfToken.description: The file token generated by uploading the PDF file.

403.description: notAuthor: Not the author of the article retracted: the article has been retracted.

codeLink.description: Link to code. Should pass validation from utils/codeLink.ts

pdfToken.description: The file token generated by uploading the PDF file.

id.description: The id of the new article.

UploadArticleSchema.description: Upload an new article into the platform.

file.description: The file object. 1 PDF per request.

token.description: The token for the upload. It is used to upload the following content of the article.

UploadScriptSchema.description: Upload a script into the platform. Expect Content-Type to be multipart/form-data. Only accepts txt, pdf, docx, doc

201.description: Email reset mail has been sent.

403.description: The reset password token is invalid.

ResetPasswordSchema.description: Reset password with a password reset token.

ValidatePasswordResetTokenSchema.description: Validate a token (a link) for password reset.

ChangeAccountInfoSchema.description: Change the account info of the current logged in user.

200.description: The publicity has been successfully changed. Returns the new publicity.

403.description: Only the owner can change the owner set publicity of an article.

ChangeArticleOwnerSetPublicitySchema.description: Change the owner set publicity of an article.

403.description: The current password is not correct.

ChangePasswordSchema.description: Change the password of the current logged in user.

ChangeProfileSchema.description: Change the profile of the current logged in user.

200.description: Returns the profile of current logged in user.

GetAccountInfoSchema.description: Get the profile of current logged in user.

page.description: The page number. 10 results per page.

200.description: Returns the profile of current logged in user.

GetProfileSchema.description: Get the profile of current logged in user.

email.description: The email. Requires to be an edu email.

ValidateEmailSchema.description: Validate a email with a token.
